definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
When the girl smiles, the matchmaker's job is half done. (idiom)
pinyin: shao4 nu:3 lu4 xiao4 lian3 , hun1 shi4 ban4 cheng2 quan2
containing_words.word: 少女露笑脸，婚事半成全

sentences.english: The name of the eclipsing girl, whatever it was, has not been handed down.
sentences.chinese: 压倒群芳的少女，姓名并未留传下来。

sentences.english: The boys and girls danced to the disco music.
sentences.chinese: 少男少女们跟着迪斯科音乐跳舞。

sentences.english: The first semi-autobiographical movie "Miracle Girl" will also be shot in China.
sentences.chinese: 第一部半自传式的电影“奇迹少女”也将在国内拍色。

sentences.english: This might be the reason why the Valkyries are also called the "Battle Maidens."
sentences.chinese: 这可能是女武神的原因也被称为“战斗少女。”

sentences.english: Her ship is crewed by beautiful young maids who geld every male they capture.
sentences.chinese: 她带领着一船年轻少女，阉掉每个抓获的男人。

sentences.english: Can he weigh out the feather-soft heart of maiden?
sentences.chinese: 少女羽毛般轻柔的心，他能掂出重量吗？

sentences.english: Like thousands of kids, Loretta's a problem at school.
sentences.chinese: 像其他数千小孩一样，洛蕾塔在学校是个问题少女。

sentences.english: But happy for the girls can find no allocation.
sentences.chinese: 但求幸福的少女可以找到绝配。

sentences.english: She spent her girlhood in the country.
sentences.chinese: 她少女时期是在乡下度过。

sentences.english: Clasp a rare and radiant maiden whom the angels name Lenore.
sentences.chinese: 拥抱被天使叫作丽诺尔的少女，她美丽娇艳。

sentences.english: If still alive, she must now have been in the flush and bloom of early womanhood.
sentences.chinese: 如果她还活着，如今应该是个楚楚动人的少女了。

sentences.english: The young girls and boys boogied all night long.
sentences.chinese: 那些少男少女跳了个通宵的迪斯科舞。

sentences.english: Medication was given to antidote the poison the young girl had swallowed.
sentences.chinese: 那个吞下毒物的少女已服用了解毒药。

sentences.english: Under-16s would usually need a prescription to prevent a possible pregnancy in this way.
sentences.chinese: 16岁以下的少女通常需要药方，才可以以此避孕。

sentences.english: Then, when an adolescent Ewok comes of age, she attends the Festival of the Hoods.
sentences.chinese: 当伊沃克人少女成龄时，要参加“成年礼”。

sentences.english: Maiden, that read'st this simple rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 少女，快阅读这天然的华章。

definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
